page.title: 03EVENTS
page.content: The Halstead cycle race started in 1953 and so far 32 races have been held. The route travels through the North East Essex countryside. The date it took place this year was March 17th. Normally the race starts at 11 o'clock but due to snow blocking the roads it was delayed until 12.15pm. The Halstead cycle race was sponsored by Hurst the French Derailleur gear concern. This years winner was Gornall. The route was cut down because of the delays caused by the snow on the roads. The winners time was 2hours 30minutes and 34seconds which is very fast as the route is very long.
